activities: Harbor Litigation Solutions provides services in forensic data harvesting, data filtering,culling and de-duplication, data processing, and hosted review of native or image files.  Personal Information may be collected in the EU by Harbor Litigation Solutions or by its client or others at the client’s and/or legal counsel’s direction. Personal Information from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland may be sent to Harbor Litigation Solutions’ United States facilities by the client or by Harbor Litigation Solutions or others at the client’s and/or legal counsel’s direction.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
